snippet.title: Construct a Building in MegaWorld Strategy
snippet.description:
In this tutorial, we will walk you through the process of constructing an Industrial Building and initiating resource production in MegaWorld, the Web3 city builder strategy game.

Read more: https://www.megaworld.io/guidelines/build_func
Play the MegaWorld Strategy: https://www.megaworld.io/
Ask the community: https://create.megaworld.io/
